name: Egged World
description:
Controls: 

WASD to Move

Left click to shoot normal bullets

Right Click to shoot Explosion bullets

Aim of the game:

This game is a game where you need to try and egg Everything in the world to stop the world from ending

You have 5 minutes to complete this task 

Game Made by:

Kokoku no Kami#1635 (Ethan)
